mapper.insert: insert into course (course_id, major_id, course_name, status, kind, book, credits, courseFee) values (#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{book,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coursefee,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update course set major_id = #{majorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, book = #{book,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credits = #{credits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, courseFee = #{coursefee,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select course_id, major_id, course_name, status, kind, book, credits, courseFee from course
